# grammarCheckingResult(range:details:)

**Type Method**

Creates and returns a text checking result with the specified array of grammatical errors.

## Declaration

```swift
class func grammarCheckingResult(range: NSRange, details: [[String : Any]]) -> NSTextCheckingResult
```

## Parameters

- **range**: The range of the detected result.
- **details**: An array of details regarding the grammatical errors. This array of strings is suitable for presenting to the user.

## Return Value

Returns an `NSTextCheckingResult` with the specified [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSTextCheckingResult/range] and a [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSTextCheckingResult/resultType] of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSTextCheckingResult/CheckingType/grammar].

## Text Checking Results for Grammar

- **grammarDetails**: The details of a located grammatical type checking result.
